name: The Liar's Parable: A Very Polished Game Indeed
name_original: The Liar's Parable: A Very Polished Game Indeed
description:
The Stanley Parable, but if the game dev's had no time and experience, and the narrator is lying to you!

Don't leave after level4's hard jumps, please stick with it, there is a reason for it trust me.  (I swear they are possible)

This game was my (and the entire team consisting of 3 people) game jam, and it was a jam! but I will say I won't do anymore game jams if they are longer than 3 days, this was so hard to make

Well thanks for reading, and very big thanks for playing <3
